pages.title: Overpowered weak mechanic soul
pages.text: This is you first attempt to bypass rules of metaphysics. Well, not so successful as you hope it would be.$(p)Naive combination of any mechanic soul and nether star lead to some result ...

Overpowered versions of mechanic souls doesn't consumes item durability when use it.$(p)But everything come for price. If you try to perform any operation with this soul without enough fuel - upgrade will broke immediately.
